description.en:
Kikukawa Shiori wakes up from a motorcycle accident only to find out she's lost her memory! Try as she might, she can't remember anything about the yankee-looking boy who claims to be her boyfriend, her kind-hearted and good looking older brother, or her aloof and introverted younger sister.  
  
When she goes to school for the first time since her accident, she overhears people talking about her—and the things they say aren't flattering. From what she hears, she was a terrible person before the accident. Was she really as horrible as they're making her out to be? And will she ever get her memory back?

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity IV: The Forbidden Advent Garden, Salem - Heretical Salem

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点Ⅳ 禁忌降臨庭園 セイレム 異端なるセイレム

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten IV: Kinki Kourin Teien, Salem - Itan naru Salem

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпопея Остатка-Псевдосингулярность IV: Запретный сад Адвента, Салем-Салем Ереси

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng IV - Khu Vườn Giáng Lâm Cấm Kỵ Salem - Salem Dị Giáo

description.en: As a result of the efforts of the people of Chaldea, the human incineration plan of those who called themselves the Magic King was bitterly stopped at the water's edge, and the destiny of the world seemed to be breathing again. However, suddenly, the singularity of the same level as the singularity so far is observed in modern times. A master who has opened up the future once again puts himself into a layershift to calm down the "subspecies singularities" that appeared in the cursed land "Salem."
description.ru: Халдея во главе с Рицука Фуджимару, мастером, проникшим на проклятую землю «Салем», чтобы ответить на новую «особенность». "Я встретила двух девушек Эбигейл и Лавинию".

altTitles.th: ศึกเดือด 5 วิพลิกชะตา

description.en:
It was just a usual morning.  
  
Akira Shiroyanagi, a high schooler who loves games and Konpeito (Japanese sweets), is suddenly dragged into a battlefield by a mysterious girl who calls herself Mion. The participants are told that they are "erased from the family register, involved in an experiment, and have gained certain powers."  
  
Akira is determined to win the game with his newfound powers and destroy the organization. Armed with a power no one expects and his "brain" skills, a new era of intelligence battle of begins!

Sporting an exhausted expression and a T-shirt with a large tiger printed on it, Matsuri Kitou’s taste in fashion is like a school delinquent. Unexpectedly, she soon finds herself working at one of the centers of fashion in Shibuya, a clothing store named omne.
Supervised by MB, a fashion blogger who knows the ins-and-outs of the industry, this story all about life working in a clothing store begins!

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en: Unbeknownst to their friends and classmates, Nanoha and Chidori are dating. Watch as they try to keep their relationship secret!
description.es: A las espaldas de sus amigas y compañeras the salón, Nanoha y Chidori están saliendo juntas. ¡Velas tratando de mantener su relación en secreto!

altTitles.en: The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

title.en: Houkago no Meikyuu Boukensha: Nippon to Isekai wo Ikiki Dekiru You ni Natta Boku wa Level Up ni Isoshimi Masu

altTitles.ja-ro: Houkago no Meikyuu Boukensha: Nippon to Isekai wo Ikiki Dekiru You ni Natta Boku wa Level Up ni Isoshimi Masu

altTitles.ja: 放課後の迷宮冒険者～日本と異世界を行き来できるようになった僕はレベルアップに勤しみます～

altTitles.en: After School Labyrinth Adventurer ~I'm Now Able to Go Back and Forth Between Japan and Another World, and I'll Work Hard to Level Up~

description.en:
Akira Kudo, a high school student who can freely travel back and forth between Japan and another world, Do Merta. With no goals in mind, he spends his time after school enjoying life in another world as he is!

As an adventurer, he gets teased by the guild's receptionist, receives "rewards" from his magic master, and has fun with the girl he helped...!?

"I hate pain! I don't care about ranking up! Guild requests are also troublesome!"

A leisurely labyrinth exploration fantasy just for after school!

altTitles.ja: この裏アカ、先生でしょ？

description.en:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.

It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.

A very special prison with only women!

Ahn Taeseong, one of the world's leading conglomerates, creates a very special women's prison in order to protect his precious daughter Jiae. There, Jiae forms her own harlem and continues her debauchery life.
However, there she also meets Eunha, who has been charged with attempted murder. Intrigued by the other woman, Jiae pretends to help Eunha in her jailbreak plan, but falls into a world of lust with her...

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
High school is difficult for most kids. But for Kayano, a shy girl whose single mother seems to work all the time, it's even worse than usual. She's so afraid of drawing attention to herself that she can't tell the handsome Kamijo how much she loves him until one day she finally gets up the courage to write him a letter confessing her feelings…  
  
Formerly licensed in English by CMX.
description.pt-br: Kayano irá se confessar pela primeira vez em toda a sua vida para seu amado Kamijou-kun. Mas ela acaba por confundir as pessoas!! E essa pessoa é ninguém menos que o super problemático Edogawa Takeru! Tudo isso acaba virando um sério problema para a pobre Kayono! "Uma guerra de amor perigoso!"

description.en: One morning, ten years of Yoon Dami's life vanished. It all began when she got entangled with a man who claimed to be a god. However, the god dismissed Dami, saying it had nothing to do with him. Then, he discovered the existence of a "thing" he had been searching for in Dami's household for a long time, and this began to change his relationship with Dami. But is it possible to mend a relationship that has already become so strained?
description.ko:
하루 아침에 10년의 세월이 사라져버린 여자 윤다미, 그 모든 게 신이라는 남자와 엮이면서 시작되었다.
하지만 신은 본인과는 무관한 일이라며 다미를 무시한다.
그러던 중 다미의 집안에 오랫동안 찾아 헤매던 ‘물건’의 존재를 알게 되면서 다미와의 관계에 변화를 주기 시작한다.
하지만 이미 틀어져 버릴 대로 틀어져 버린 관계를 되돌릴 수 있을까?

title.en: Isekai Saikyou no Yome desu ga, Yoru no Tatakai wa Ore no Hou ga Tsuyoi You desu ~Chiryaku o Ikashite Nariagaru Harem Senki~

altTitles.ja: 異世界最強の嫁ですが、夜の戦いは俺の方が強いようです~知略を活かして成り上がるハーレム戦記~

altTitles.id: Dia Pengantin Terkuat di Dunia Lain, Tapi Sepertinya Aku Lebih Kuat Dalam Perkelahian Malam ~ Catatan Pertempuran Harem yang Memanfaatkan Kebijaksanaan~

altTitles.en: She's the Strongest Bride, But I'm Stronger in Night Battles: A Harem Chronicle of Advancing Through Cunning Tactics
She's the Strongest Bride in Another World, but It Seems I'm Stronger in Night Battles: A Harem Chronicle of Advancing through Cunning Tactics

description.en:
Albert is reborn in another world and strives for a peaceful life in the Kingdom of Alexa. However, after being "kidnapped" by a Demon Goddess of war, Marida, he becomes a wanted man by the Kingdom!

Unable to return to his original country, Albert decides to live in the Empire of Eranzia. While enjoying intimate moments with the alluring body of Marida (but not just her!), he uses his previous worlds knowledge to achieve great accomplishments in governance, military affairs, strategy and of course..... Night-time battles!

A slightly risqué harem comedy begins!
description.id:
Albert, yang bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain, mengincar kehidupan yang damai di Kerajaan Alexa. Namun, dia diculik oleh Marida, ras wanita iblis, makhluk terkuat di bumi untuk memandunya dalam peperangan. Albert yang tidak dapat kembali ke negara asalnya, memutuskan untuk tinggal di Kerajaan Elancia. Marida yang memiliki tubuh yang menarik dan pemikiran yang baik, akhirnya mereka bekerja sama, ia memanfaatkan pengetahuan modernnya untuk membuat prestasi besar dalam urusan rumah tangga, urusan militer, konspirasi, dll!?

(MTL)
description.ja: 異世界に転生したアルベルトはアレクサ王国で安泰な生活を目指していた。しかし、地上最強生物で鮮血鬼と呼ばれる鬼人族の女性マリーダに攫われ、しかも襲撃の手引きをしたとして、王国から指名手配される。エランシア帝国でマリーダの婿として生きていくことを決めたアルベルトは、魅力的な肉体を持つマリーダとの夜の営みに励みつつ、現代知識を活かして、内政、軍事、謀略などで大きな功績を挙げる！？

altTitles.ja: The Executioner and Her Way of Life

altTitles.zh-ro: Chǔxíng shàonǚ de shēngcún zhī dào

altTitles.de: Virgin Road – Die Henkerin und ihre Art zu leben

altTitles.th: เวอร์จินโร้ด เพชฌฆาตสาวบนเส้นทางพิสุทธิ์

description.en:
In this world, there are Strays - people who arrived from another world's Japan. These Strays were responsible for great disasters in the past so upon being spotted, they are meant to be killed by Executioners.  
  
Menou, an Executioner, meets a Stray named Akari, who she kills without hesitation. Yet, Akari comes back to life. Searching for a way to kill her, this journey of Akari and Menou begins.
A series of 4koma comics featuring Osage-chan by Nukunuku Nigirimeshi (@NKNK_NGRMS).

altTitles.ja: たったひとつのことしか知らない

altTitles.en: The One Thing I Don’t Know About You

description.en:
Fujinoki, an ordinary office worker, finds unexpected joy in the irregular calls from his elementary school classmate, Akaiwa. After 20 years without seeing each other, Fujinoki has no clue about Akaiwa's whereabouts or occupation. However, their peculiar phone-only friendship takes an unexpected turn!

This edition includes bonus pages appended to the ending, thanks to the overwhelming positive response from the readers! From the talented author Honda, creator of "Honda-san the Skeleton Bookstore Employee."
description.ja: 平々凡々なサラリーマン・藤ノ木の秘かな楽しみは、小学生のとき同級生だった男・赤岩から不定期にかかってくる電話だ。もう20年も会っておらず、今はどこで何をしているのかも分からない。この電話だけで繋がった奇妙な友情は、いつしかとんでもない方向へ転がっていき――。『ガイコツ書店員 本田さん』の本田氏が贈る、男2人の物語！ラストシーンに大きな反響・感動を呼んだ読み切り傑作を電子書籍化。おまけ漫画も収録！

title.en: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter

altTitles.zh: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Dazaole Mori Anquan Wu

altTitles.en: Freezing The World: I Built A Doomsday Safehouse

altTitles.zh: Quán Qiú Bīng Fēng: Wǒ Dǎzàole Mòrì Ānquán Wū

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

altTitles.ja: 虎鶫 とらつぐみ －TSUGUMI PROJECT

description.en:
Leon, an elite soldier from a militaristic Europe, was forcibly embarked on a secret expedition. In a ruined Japan, abandoned for more than 200 years, he and his companions in misfortune must recover a terrifying weapon. Its code name: Tsugumi. All we know about it is that its destructive potential is such that the world has preferred to crush the archipelago under a shower of atomic bombs rather than see its development completed…  
  
But the operation turned short: the plane crashed, and Leon found himself alone in Tokyo Bay. Hungry, at the end of his strength, with only one anti-radiation suit for protection, he quickly discovers that the city is not as deserted as expected.  
  
An original project launched by publisher Ki-Oon, written in Japanese but first published in French.
description.ru:
Леон, элитный солдат из милитаристской Европы, насильно отправленный в секретную экспедицию. В разрушенной Японии, заброшенной более 200 лет, он и его товарищи по несчастью должны забрать ужасающее оружие. Его кодовое название: «Дрозд».  
  
Все, что они знают о нем, это то, что его разрушительный потенциал таков, что мир скорее исчезнет под потоком атомных бомб, чем увидит свой закат развития…  
  
Но операция оказалась короткой: самолет потерпел крушение, и Леон оказался один в Токийском заливе. Истощенный, на последнем издыхание, только с одним радиационным костюмом защиты, он быстро обнаруживает, что город не такой пустынный, как ожидалось…

title.en: My Stepsister Who is Perfect in Public, Shows Her True Colors at Home

altTitles.ja: 外面は最高なのに、家では本性むき出しの義姉

altTitles.ja-ro: Sotozura wa Saikou na no ni, Ie de wa Honsei Mukidashi no Gimai

altTitles.en: Even though the outside is the best, her sister-in-law has a bare nature at home

altTitles.es-la: Mi hermanastra que es perfecta en público, muestra su verdadera cara en casa.

description.en:
**Second English title is the one used on Amazon.** (I know it's not correct but thought I'd add it)

~ Heatmanga

altTitles.th: 【เกิดใหม่เป็นลูกโอชิ】

altTitles.pt-br: Oshi no Ko - Minha Estrela Preferida

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

title.en: There Is No True Peace in This World -Shin Kamen Rider SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja: 真の安らぎはこの世になく-シン・仮面ライダー SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Yasuragi wa Konoyo ni Naku -Shin Kamen Raidā Shokkā Saido-

altTitles.la: Nulla Mundo Pax Sincera: SHOCKER SIDE

description.en: A completely original manga project spun-off from *Shin Kamen Rider* directed by Anno Hideaki! A dark hero rising story by a superb production team depicting the biggest enemy in *Shin Kamen Rider* and *SHOCKER*!
description.ja: 庵野秀明監督作品『シン・仮面ライダー』より、完全オリジナルの漫画プロジェクト！ 超豪華制作陣が『シン・仮面ライダー』作中最大の敵と、"SHOCKER"を描く、ダークヒーロー・ライジング・ストーリー！！

description.en:
I thought I could keep moving forward, but in an unexpected instant, I’ve lost myself in the gaps of this vast universe. Where have I seen this, this landscape that doesn’t exist? Right over there, in a time that will never come to pass. Welcome to the world of panpanya.    The 22 chapters of Makura Uo, which include stories like Ame no Hi (Rainy Day) and Gomi no Sakebigoe (The Cries of Trash), were either serialized in the special web edition of Hakusensha’s Rakuen Le Paradis magazine or published as doujinshi. Included are entries from panpanya’s diary as well as annotations from the author herself.    

(Source: AniList)
description.ru: Странные будни странной девочки в странном городе, полном странных созданий.

altTitles.en: K -ความทรงจำของสีแดง-
K -メモリー・オブ・レッド-

description.en: Set in a world where history has taken a slightly different course from the one we're familiar with. In Shizume City there is a psychic war between seven kings. The story goes that the Third King, known as the Red King, created a group called HOMRA filled with extraordinary people. If you manage to join HOMRA, you also acquire unbelievable psychic abilities.

title.en: The Villainess Refuses to Flirt With the Male Lead

altTitles.zh-ro: E Nü Jujue Pao Nan Zhu

description.en:
Transmigrating as the villainess of a cliché imperial manhua isn't scary, what's scary is that the male leads are all children! Not only do I have to take care of children, but I'm also being courted by one of them and being called "wife"! Ms. Hong would like to say: "Fuck you, god!" 凸(｀⌒´メ)凸

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://page.kakao.com/content/59080258)

altTitles.ja: キラキラしても、しなくても

description.en: Sparkling love is not the only kind there is. Keita is a high school student who likes his friend Masato. However, his love could not be more different from the sort of sparkling love often seen in BL… This is a delicate, bittersweet story of adolescence.
description.ja: キラキラした恋、だけじゃない。高校生の慶太は、友だちの正人のことが好き。しかし、BLでよく見るようなキラキラした恋と自分の恋は、似ても似つかなくてーー。ほろ苦く繊細な、青い春の物語。
description.es-la: Un amor deslumbrante no es el único tipo que hay. Keita es un estudiante de preparatoria al que le gusta su amigo Masato. Sin embargo, su amor no está ni cerca de ser como los amores deslumbrantes que se ven seguido en los BL… Esta es una historia agridulce y delicada de la adolescencia.

description.en:
My basement is connected to another world? Sena, who gained fame for her exceptional cooking skills, is tormented by her ex-boyfriend’s stalking, as he seeks her money. One day, a mysterious door appears in Sena’s basement, and out comes Michael, a handsome man from another world who resembles a golden retriever with his kind and charming demeanor. To win his heart, Sena takes drastic measures. And that is… “Feed him chicken, lots of chicken!”

Every fortnight, the door to the other world opens. Guided by Michael, Sena crosses into this other world, capturing the hearts of its people with items from Korea and delicious food! Unveiling past secrets and embarking on delightful and noisy adventures in this other world, the story unfolds.

And then, “At some point, I found myself holding you dear to my heart. I dare say I want to be by your side and never be apart.”

A sweet and bittersweet romantic fantasy with mouth-watering food!

A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

---
Alternative Official English: [TheDuckWebComics](https://www.theduckwebcomics.com/Snake_in_the_office/5771894/)

Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
description.pl: W obliczu dnia zagłady, Ling Mo przebudził wewnątrz siebie specjalną moc. Odkrył on, że może kontrolować zombie. Dlatego mógł bezpiecznie przejść przez tłum zombie i przeżyć, a ostatecznie spotkał swoją ukochaną dziewczynę - Ye Lian, ale tylko by dowiedzieć się, że została już przekształcona w zombie. Aby pomóc Ye odzyskać swoje wspomnienia, Ling Mo rozpoczął swoje przetrwanie podczas apokalipsy.
description.es-la: Ante el día del juicio final, el poder especial dentro de Ling Mo fue despertado. Él se percató que podía controlar a los zombis. Debido a su poder, podía caminar sano y salvo a través de la multitud de zombis, y eventualmente se reunió con su amada novia, Ye Lian, pero solo para descubrir que ella ya se había transformado en un zombi. Para ayudarla a recuperar sus recuerdos, Ling Mo comenzó su supervivencia en el día del juicio final.
description.pt-br: Diante do apocalypse, o poder especial dentro de Ling Mo foi despertado. Ele descobriu que podia controlar os zumbis. Por causa de seu poder, Ele podia caminhar em segurança através de hordas de zumbis, e, eventualmente, ele se reencontrou com sua amada namorada – Ye Lian, Apenas para descobrir que ela já havia se transformado em um zumbi. Para ajudá-la a recuperar suas memórias, Ling Mo embarca em uma jornada para sobreviver no apocalypse.

description.en: When Joon moves into a new apartment for his first day in college, he was not expecting an ex celebrity, Duna, to be living downstairs, hiding from her past life. Joon finds Duna strange and avoids her at first, but soon finds himself in her room without realizing what he is getting himself into. The Girl Downstairs is a new college romance story from the creator of hit series, Nano List.

title.en: Ore no Shibou Flag ga Todomaru Tokoro wo Shiranai

altTitles.en: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending

altTitles.zh: 不知我的死亡flag将于何处停止

altTitles.ja: 俺の死亡フラグが留まるところを知らない

altTitles.fr: Des risques mortels n'arrêtent pas de m'arriver

description.en:
When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game’s character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story’s most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags!  
  
Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
description.fr: Lorsqu'il reprend ses esprits, Hirasawa Kazuki, un étudiant universitaire normal, se retrouve en possession du corps du personnage d'un jeu. De plus, c'est Harold Stokes, le personnage le plus détesté de l'histoire, qui a même été baptisé 『Roi des connards』par les joueurs. L'histoire est un terrain miné qui n'attend que lui pour exploser ! Harold pourra-t-il se dégager un chemin de survie tout en évitant les innombrables "mines" de l'histoire ? Des myriades de mines attendent qu’il les écrase, comme des drapeaux de mort (Game Over)!

description.en: The story is of a masked boy, Tani, a strong young man, who has a crush on a girl named Shima Rihoko, the school volleyball star. He gets into trouble trying to get her attention, besides facing the thugs of the school. He’s a very jealous guy, and will not let anyone get close to Shima-san.

A story about a delinquent boy turned into a violent magical girl.  
  
Note: Season 2 is being uploaded to the author's weibo page.  
Refer to this [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/w41PzRvz) for details and links to the season 2 raws.

title.en: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei

altTitles.en: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober
Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

altTitles.ja: 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en:
The near future in a quiet seaside town.
Yoshioka, who has recently lost his wife, just wants to spend the rest of his days in peace.
However, Yoshioka's children, worried about their father's health, 
send an off-model housekeeping robot called Ponko to help him.
Unusual for the age, as human-like robots are then considered obsolete, 
Ponko does her best to serve Yoshioka, but her "best" is not that good. 
Yoshioka's quiet life is now changing, as this eager but ditzy robot girl manages to keep his hands full…
description.tr: Sahil kasabası ve yakın gelecek. Yakın zamanda eşini kaybeden Yoshioka, kalan zamanını huzur içinde geçirmek istiyor. Ancak Yoshioka'nın çocukları, babalarının sağlığı için endişelendiğinden, Ponko isimli eski model bir temizlik robotunu yardım maksatlı yanlarına gönderdiler. Yoshioka'nın sessiz hayatı artık değişmeye başladı.
description.pt-br: Em um futuro próximo, em cidade quieta próxima ao mar, Yoshioka, que recentemente perdeu sua esposa, quer passar o resto dos seus dias em paz. Porém, os filhos de Yoshioka, preocupados com a saúde de seu pai, enviaram uma empregada robô para ajudá-lo. A vida pacífica de Yoshioka está prestes a mudar.

description.en: You must take the fall with me.The abuse people suffer during their childhood will all burst out all at once when they grow up. Some people choose to vent their anger to the outside world, but some people will only keep it in and torture themselvesThis is quite literally the description from bilibili 😭 - Kora

description.fr: Juste avant son mariage, Yun Gu, un PDG tyrannique, meurt dans un accident de voiture causé par son meilleur ami. Son âme se réincarne en LingXi Tang, la plus jeune fille de la famille Tang, décédée à un jeune âge il y a plus de 10 ans. Il doit alors utiliser sa nouvelle identité pour protéger son "moi" adolescent, enquêter sur le comportement de son meilleur ami qui a tout manigancé dans son dos et révéler la véritable personnalité de sa future femme.

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano Sanayin ang Iyong Jowang Utak-Bulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!
description.ja: 御城琴音は超がつくお嬢様の高校１年生。駅の券売機の使い方が分からず困っているところを通りがかりの高校１年生・瀬和すぐるに助けられたのをきっかけに、瀬和の高校に転校してきた。はじめての電車。はじめてのカレーうどん。はじめての友達。「はじめてを教えて欲しい」お嬢様と世話焼き男子高校生のはじめてラブコメディ！

description.en: The setting is Tokyo. Rumors are going around Tokyo of a prize of ten million for beating "Gyokutei Shinjuku" at blind soccer, and blind soccer experiences a sudden surge. Meanwhile, not far away in Ikebukuro, a South Korean girl named Ji-he recruits members for a blind soccer team. And one day, while working at a cabaret club, a blind young man named Oyamada comes in. Despite never playing blind soccer before, Oyamada is somewhat forcefully dragged into the team to fill out the numbers. However, this man actually is...
description.ja: 舞台は東京。ブラインドサッカーチーム「玉帝新宿」に勝てば賞金1千万という噂が東京を駆け巡り、にかわにブラインドサッカーが盛り上がりを見せる。その頃、少し離れた池袋で、ブラサカチームのメンバー探しをする韓国人の女の子・ジヘ。ある日、彼女が勤務するキャバクラに、盲目の青年・小山田がやってくる。ブラインドサッカー未経験ながら、数合わせのため半ば強引にチームに入れられる小山田。しかし、この男、実は……。

title.en: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi

altTitles.pt-br: Mo Dao Zu Shi - O Fundador da Cultivação Demoníaca

description.en:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
description.pl:
Wei Wuxian, założyciel demonicznej sekty, przemierzał świat w swój rozpustny sposób, znienawidzony przez miliony za chaos, który wywołał. Ostatecznie został zdradzony przez swojego najdroższego shidi i zamordowany przez potężne klany, które złączyły siły, by go pokonać. Po kilkunastu latach ocknął się w ciele szaleńca, który został porzucony przez rodzinę. Niedługo później siłą zostaje przygarnięty przez Lan Wangji, jego arcywroga. Tak rozpoczyna się trzymająca w napięciu i wywołująca śmiech wędrówka złożona z pokonywania potworów i rozwiązywania tajemnic. I kto im zabroni trochę poflirtować po drodze?  
  
[Tłumaczenie powieści](https://dracaena.webd.pl/portfolio/mo-dao-zu-shi/)

description.en: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

title.en: I Confessed to a Lone Wolf Girl

altTitles.ja: 一匹狼な子に告白した

altTitles.ja-ro: Ippiki Ookami na Ko ni Kokuhaku Shita

altTitles.es-la: Me le confesé a una chica solitaria

altTitles.id: Aku menembak seorang gadis serigala penyendiri

description.en: A man confesses his love to a lone wolf girl.
description.id: seorang pria menyatakan cintanya pada seorang gadis serigala penyendiri
description.ru: Парень признается в любви одинокой девушке

description.en: My senpai challenges me to a fight with her, but if I win... Will she become my girlfriend!?

title.en: Logout Shita no wa VRMMO Janaku Honmono no Isekai deshita ~Genjitsu ni Modotte no Status ga Kowareteiru Ken~

altTitles.ja: ログアウトしたのはVRMMOじゃなく本物の異世界でした　～現実に戻ってもステータスが壊れている件～

altTitles.en: I Logged Out of the Real Other World, Not a VRMMO ~My Status Is Still Broken When I Return to Reality~

description.en:
A strange "real" world appears before the eyes of a boy who has cleared a VR game and returned! The best Musou strategy story, with mysteries and beautiful girls looming, begins here!

While testing his brand new VRMMO, Kanzaki Reito was trapped inside the game for three years. He defeated the final boss of the game and was finally freed, but what he returned to was that something odd happened to the real world. A "little sister" of his out of nowhere, Reito can still use the same ability as in the game, and monsters appear. Will Reito make use of his overwhelming power and become the savior of this world??
description.ja:
***VRゲームをクリアして戻ってきた少年の目の前に現れた、見知らぬ「現実」世界！　謎と美少女が迫りくる最高の無双攻略記、ここに開幕！！***

新作VRMMOのテストプレイ中に、ゲームの中に3年も閉じ込められた高校生・神崎怜人。
ボスを倒しついに解放されたのだが、戻ってきたのは見知らぬ現実世界だった。
見知らぬ妹の存在。ゲームと同じスキルが使え、魔物が現れる。
圧倒的な力を駆使し、怜人はこの世界の救世主となるのか…！？

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1720gr)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://dash.shueisha.co.jp/library/index/%E3%81%A8%E3%83%BC%E3%82%8F/1)

title.en: Tsuihousareta Meika no Chounan – Baka ni Sareta Hazure Skill de Saikyou e to Nobori Tsumeru

altTitles.ja: 追放された名家の長男 ～馬鹿にされたハズレスキルで最強へと昇り詰める～
追放された名家の長男

altTitles.en: The Exiled First-Born of the Noble House ~Rise to the Top With Ridiculously Haphazard Skills~
The Exiled First-Born of the Noble House

description.en: Chris, the eldest son of a prestigious family that has been bestowed the profession of the sword for generations, is banished from his home after receiving the profession of “Farmer” in the Grace of Heaven ceremony. Amid his despair, he discovers that a special power lies hidden within his unique skill of poison resistance!?
